Introduction.Title: Gain actionable insights into the popularity of websites and online services
Introduction.Description: Monitor the popularity of a hostname and track how it changes over time.

Feature.Title: Benchmark popularity
Feature.Description: Our Traffic Index is benchmarked against the most popular website in a country. You can compare growth or decline over time by viewing weekly or monthly data, both at the hostname and subdomain level.

Feature.Title: Track web services usage
Feature.Description: Discover how services like Shopify, Netflix, or Slack are performing by analyzing their presence in domain traffic rankings over time.

Feature.Title: Detect activity
Feature.Description: Use the Traffic Index to identify sudden spikes or drops in popularity and understand their root causes. Ideal for competitive analysis and fraud detection.
